entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rancheria
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
